trans-unit.source: Specifies that a local file should be staged to blob storage.
trans-unit.target: Specifies that a local file should be staged to blob storage.

trans-unit.source: The specified account will be charged for storage costs.
trans-unit.target: The specified account will be charged for storage costs.

trans-unit.source: The name of the local file.
trans-unit.target: The name of the local file.

trans-unit.source: The storage credentials to be used when creating the default container.
trans-unit.target: The storage credentials to be used when creating the default container.

trans-unit.source: Optional name to be given to the file on the VM.
trans-unit.target: Optional name to be given to the file on the VM.

trans-unit.source: If this parameter is null or missing the name on the VM will be set to the value of localFileToStage stripped of all path information.
trans-unit.target: If this parameter is null or missing the name on the VM will be set to the value of localFileToStage stripped of all path information.
